name: Into The Unknown
description: There's nothing scarier than waking up in the middle of the forest alone... or so it seems. Taking control of Rachel in this short, story driven, exploration game, you must find out where you are, why you're there, and most importantly, how to get out. What will you uncover when you delve into the unknown?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+. Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. Storage: 130.1 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Considering this game was made by a couple of middle schoolers, I am impressed. It's a game to play if you have 15min to kill. An overall good starting point, but could use more work. I look forward to more games from FYRE Games.
